actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Domestic and International Monetary Policy.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Domestic and International Monetary Policy

official_title: To require the Secretary of the Treasury to mint coins in commemoration of veterans of the Armed Forces of the United States and to use the proceeds of surcharges imposed on the sale of such coins to fund the transportation of veterans to and from hospitals administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs.

summary.text: Veterans Commemoration Act of 2000 - Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to mint and issue a maximum of 500,000 $1 coins to commemorate the service of veterans of the United States armed forces.Mandates that the proceeds from sale surcharges be paid promptly to the Disabled American Veterans to fund the transportation of veterans to and from hospitals administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs.

titles.title: To require the Secretary of the Treasury to mint coins in commemoration of veterans of the Armed Forces of the United States and to use the proceeds of surcharges imposed on the sale of such coins to fund the transportation of veterans to and from hospitals administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs.
